nature.title: EXPERIENCE NATURE
nature.desc: We offer a unique experience within the magical energy of the Mayan jungle, ideal for couples, ilias, yogis and solo adventures.

ammenities.title: AMENITIES
ammenities.desc: The property has 4 completely private suites, covering for meditation or daring a pleasant time, each with its bathroom open to nature, the central cabin has a full kitchen and sofa bed.

private.title: PRIVATE ROOM
private.desc: Very cozy rooms, private ecological suites, private terrace, cool and quiet areas, air conditioning, tapanco for free time, bathrooms open to nature, view of the cenote and more.

rooms.title: Ecological rooms
desc: Located at km 11 of La Ruta de los Cenotes, in front of Club de Polo el Rey. 10 minutes from the beach in Puerto Morelos
Palapa with tables and bar. Shared full kitchen with refrigerator, oven, grill, coffee maker, shelves and freezer
We have a work space with high speed internet, bathroom and drink bar.

experience.title: Mayan temazcal
desc: Temazcal is a ceremony of physical, mental and spiritual purification. We enter the inipi to let go of what we do not need for our daily life, to let go of our fear, anger, depression and all the things that really do not belong to us. We have a 90 minute ceremony in a group and in a couple. Close your temazcal by swimming in the cenote in the moonlight.
